history.proof: intros x y z H. symmetry. unfold Nat.sub. rewrite Nat.add_sub_swap. reflexivity. sfirstorder depth: 3use: plus_minus.

In environment x, y, z : nat H : y <= x Unable to unify "?M1412 - ?M1413 = ?M1414" with "x - y + z = (fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end) x y + z".

original: intros x y z H. apply Nat.add_sub_eq_r. symmetry. apply plus_minus. unfold Nat.sub. rewrite Nat.add_sub_assoc. rewrite plus_minus. rewrite Nat.add_sub_swap. apply Nat.add_sub_eq_l. reflexivity.
